thread.title: ‘Jolly LLB 2’ box-office collection Day 10: Here is how much Akshay Kumar’s courtroom-dramedy ‘Jolly LLB 2’ earned on its second Sunday
thread.title_full: ‘Jolly LLB 2’ box-office collection Day 10: Here is how much Akshay Kumar’s courtroom-dramedy ‘Jolly LLB 2’ earned on its second Sunday

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: ‘Jolly LLB 2’ box-office collection Day 10: Here is how much Akshay Kumar’s courtroom-dramedy ‘Jolly LLB 2’ earned on its second Sunday
text:
Akshay Kumar 's courtroom-dramedy 'Jolly LLB 2' earned approximately Rs. 6.5 crore on its second Sunday and took the total domestic collection to Rs 88.48 crore (nett), according to a report on boxofficeindia.com.
Akshay Kumar wraps up shooting for 'Toilet - Ek Prem Katha'
The film's producers also released their figures, which Quote: that the movie earned Rs 7.24 crore on Sunday and the total domestic box-office collection stands at Rs 95.44 crore.
'Jolly LLB 2' is the second instalment in the 'Jolly LLB' film series helmed by Subhash Kapoor. The 2013 film had Arshad Warsi and Boman Irani in lead roles and was a sleeper hit. For the second instalment, director Subhash Kapoor chose Akshay to lead the cast while Huma Qureshi , Annu Kapoor and Saurabh Shukla essay prominent roles.
After 'Jolly LLB 2', Akshay has a string of releases in the pipeline this year. Khiladi Kumar will be next seen in a cameo in Taapsee Pannu-starrer 'Naam Shabana', the prequel to the 2013 hit 'Baby'. Followed by this, Akshay will be seen in 'Toilet: Ek Prem Katha' and '2.0', the sequel to 'Enthiran', that will see Rajinikanth and Akshay share screen space.
Jolly LLB 2: 'Go Pagal' video Song 02:19
